## NodeImageBitmap class

A Node implementation for DOM ImageBitmap.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NodeImageBitmap implements IImageBitmap 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [\_alphaData](./canvas-cleave.nodeimagebitmap._alphadata.md) |  | <code>Uint8ClampedArray</code> | The raw alpha data of the image bitmap. |
|  [\_hasAlpha](./canvas-cleave.nodeimagebitmap._hasalpha.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Controls the image bitmap's alpha channel. |
|  [\_rgbData](./canvas-cleave.nodeimagebitmap._rgbdata.md) |  | <code>Uint8ClampedArray</code> | The raw RGB data of the image bitmap. |
|  [height](./canvas-cleave.nodeimagebitmap.height.md) |  | <code>number</code> | The height of the image bitmap. |
|  [MAXIMUM\_MEMORY\_SIZE](./canvas-cleave.nodeimagebitmap.maximum_memory_size.md) | <code>static</code> | <code>number</code> | The maximum memory size of the bitmap. |
|  [width](./canvas-cleave.nodeimagebitmap.width.md) |  | <code>number</code> | The width of the image bitmap. |
